attributes.action: Show all Premier League on TV while fans not in stadiums and stop pay per view
attributes.additional_details:
The £15 per game price is very high, when many fans have already paid for a subscription service of £65 per month, and some are additionally paying for season tickets, which they will not be getting a refund for this year.

This decision has been taken without any consideration for, or consultation with football fans.
attributes.background: Ask the Premier League to reverse their decision on making matches pay per view and air the remaining matches using the same approach taken throughout September.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for broadcasters and the football authorities.
